pro quickdesk pro  Button Savior  Smart Taskbar lock screen

reviews.title: Great idea but did nothing on my atrix
reviews.comment: Maybe I\'m too dumb to figure out how to use this app.  It\'s a fantastic idea but the only thing that happens when I tried to use it is that the screen dims and nothing else happens. Willing to re-rate if I ever figure out how to make anything else happen.  In the meantime uninstalling...
reviews.author: Carolyn Boyle

reviews.title: Possibilities
reviews.comment: Adding Tasker integration to this would be an amazing combination! Someone else mentioned the ability to trigger shortcuts. I agree that it would also make this app that much more useful. Please develop this app further.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good job!!
reviews.comment: Realy good job.. easy to use.. it saves my hard keys on my HD2... 5 stars...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: My htc desire the home, search and menu buttons weren\'t working, this fixed that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: awesome......this is great!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Would love an update
reviews.comment: Gesture activity doesn\'t launch consistently from sidebar (on bionic), and still hoping for gesture-to-shortcut support.  this app is worth waiting for, so I just hope you\'re still maintaining it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice quickdo bar
reviews.comment: I used one when i was with my old iphone... I hope u will maintain it...  Things u can add:  - allow to change the color of the bar or even to transparent  - functions to add (1) take screenshot (2) fully close app instead of running in background  - Gesture to add (1) from left/middle/right side, slide up (2) tap left/mid/right and hold for 2 seconds  Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Zmooth hasn\'t been updated in months. Finally someone came along and improved on the idea. Works great on Droid X!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Can\'t live without it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Excellent. Please keep maintaining and adding new features. If it can run w/o root, it will be better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work.  Uninstalling!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Error!
reviews.comment: I can\'t add the \"back\" button!!! Pls fix it..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very very useful!
reviews.comment: Change layout bar to right of screen, I can use phone very easy with only one hand, very useful with big screen example htc one x! Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good
reviews.comment: amazing\357\274\201nice app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: All I can say about this app is awesome. This is a must-have app for my Galaxy S2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great useful tool
reviews.comment: Makes life easier for iOS converts
reviews.author: Julius Mong

reviews.title: Don\'t work ICS
reviews.comment: Install on pics and don\'t work. Please fix.

reviews.title: Really good but..
reviews.comment: only \"home\" gesture works in my rooted p500 on Android 4.0.3 cm9. same prob with zmooth.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good idea
reviews.comment: But force closes while setting up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it.\nWould be even better if i can disable the notification after each gesture is recognized.
reviews.author: A Google User
